features: Ultimate Travel Kit: Our travel essentials set offers a wide range of 16 TRAVEL SIZE TOILETRIES, including shampoo and conditioner sets, catering to all your on-the-go needs. From vacations to business trips, our compact travel kit ensures you stay well-prepared throughout your adventures.

Hygiene On-the-Go: Our TSA Approved travel toiletry kit includes all your hygiene essentials, making it an essential companion for international travel, business, leisure trips including auto, train and air. Perfect for AIR BnB, and VRBO guest amenities and gym bags. Stay fresh and confident with our travel essentials toiletries set, specially curated for women travelers.

Labor and Delivery Must-Haves: Our Kits are perfect hospital bags for labor and delivery. Thoughtfully designed to provide essential toiletries for expectant moms. Packed with travel-size necessities, our mommy bag for the hospital ensures comfort and convenience during this special time.

Stay Prepared Everywhere: From school to air travel, our hygiene bag serves as your emergency kit for women. Packed with nationally branded travel-size toiletries, our travel essentials set keeps you ready for any journey or natural disaster.

Bulk Supplies for Care and Kindness: Looking to assemble homeless care packages? Our travel size toiletries for men and women are available in bulk, making it easier to create hygiene kits for those in need. Spread kindness and make a difference with our homeless care package supplies.

If you're a B2B Buyer, Non-Profit, or Government interested in purchasing multiple Convenience Kits International Kits with bracket pricing you've come to the right place. For Business specific discounts, make sure you're signed into your Amazon Business account.
body.description: 16PC Women’s Kit Contains: Wipes/Cleansing Cloth: Summers Eve Sensitive Singles (4 ct), Tampons/Pads: Always Ultra Thin Regular Singles (4 ct), Tampax Radiant Tampons Singles (4 ct), Pain Relief: Motrin 2 ct. (2), and TSA Compliant Quart Size Bag in a Black Quilted Zippered Toiletry Bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: If you’re traveling with only a carry on, this little package is perfect. Has enough for days and can fill it up to use again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel kit
reviews.reviewText: After reading a lot of the reviews, I bought this recently for travel. I determined it was cheaper than buying all plastic bottles and filling them with the products I needed. I was pleasantly surprised when I got the product. The pouch is sturdy and black. There are a few products I didn’t need but I pulled them out and was able to put in some additional products and they all fit perfectly. The shampoo, conditioner, body wash with the little loofah lasted long enough for my trip as did the lotions, shaver and shaving cream. It was nice they included a little packet of cotton face wipes along with cotton swabs. I could’ve done without the cotton balls which were few and extremely small. A suggestion would be a mini pack of unscented, sensitive hand wipes and a shower cap, But I just bought those at the store before I left and it did indeed fit into the pouch. I do have to go with other reviews that the toothbrush is pretty cheap and the bristles did fall out. Luckily I was able to get an extra toothbrush from the hotel but next time I’ll carry my own toothbrush in small toothbrush plastic container which I believe will fit in the bag itself. It is roomier than I thought and it is sturdy. Had no problems with packing it snuggly and the zipper was fine. The great thing besides it being TSA regulated and fitted just fine in my suitcase, is that when I got home I just refilled everything, put it back in the pouch and it’s ready for the next trip. To me, it was really worth the money and I was happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THIS KIT IS THE BEST!
reviews.reviewText: OMG...this kit is the best! It has everything I could need and more for my upcoming trip! There are even items that my husband can use, so this kit is like getting two for the price of one! It has reusable items, like a comb, nylon puff, toothbrush and more, so all I have to do is replace a few items that are disposable for my next trip. And I love the purple bag that's included (happens to be my favorite color)! It's nice quality with a very good quality zipper and is big enough to hold my other travel items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Had all the necessities for my trip
reviews.reviewText: This bag had everything I needed for my long wkd trip. I was very nervous bc I hadn't flown in almost 20yrs & hadn't had to do all the new tsa stuff. So this made it much, much easier & eased my anxiety. Everything fit perfect & once I took the cardboard out I could add a few more items. The cons I would say are very minor. The Toothbrush was falling apart & came with the bristles bent to the side. So that I had to throw away. Also, for me, the comb wasn't necessary. I would have rather they skipped those 2 & put in something else that could be used like a hand sanitizer or mini poof. Otherwise it was exactly what I needed & was much easier than buying empty bottles & filling them up. Again the only con truly was the useless beat up toothbrush

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars TSA Compliant and Useful Afterwards!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a TSA-approved clear bag in addition to appropriately sized toiletries. This product satisfied those requirements.This was priced very well, but the only downside was that it did not come with body wash. I had to pour out the conditioner bottle, rinse it, and then fill it with my own body wash. If this came with body wash, it would be ideal.But otherwise, it’s still a good choice and it gives you peace of mind in knowing that the toiletries and the clear bag conform to TSA’s standards.The clear bag is also very useful for storing your own personal toiletries after your flight home, not just toiletries for travel. I continue to use the bag to keep all my toiletries in one place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality Items
reviews.reviewText: I liked that there were many brand names that I like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was perfect for a weekend trip with just a carry on for the airplane!10/10 recommend.
